protocol.text: Seedlings were either treated with white light for 2 h (WL), incubated in the dark condition for 2 h (D), or pulse irradiation of FR light before incubated in the dark condition for 2 h (FRD).
Seedlings were grown at 22 degrees on rocklwools under continuous white light for 19 days.

Total RNA was separately prepared from leaf blades and petioles using Sepazol RNA I super kit (Nacalai Tesque), and  purified with  RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany) according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Followed Affymetrix experimental procedure. Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 microg total RNA.
Followed Affymetrix experimental procedure. 200 micro liter of hybrization solution was used for 16 hrs at 45Â°C.
GeneChips were scanned using the Gene Array Scanner (Agilent).

Array data were processed and analyzed with Microarray Suites 5.0 software (Affymetrix) and GeneSpring 7.3 (Agilent). Data values were normalized per chip to the 50th percentile and per gene to the median of that gene measurement in WL2.
